snippet.title: Therefore - Teaser video
snippet.description:
The Wanderer wakes up in the First Realm, he finds it fading away, being torn apart and consumed by The Degradation. Inside his head the voices are whining: “Save The First Realm”. 

Therefore is a pixel art open world adventure, a vivid reign where time flows as well as the weather, with living fauna and flora, a surreal world full of symbolism developed by Trim Tangle. 

http://www.trimtangle.com/
